songs.title: Raven
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
“There is old Indian legends that say lightning is when Raven is angry
And that’s his feet tearing across the sky
And that thunder is when he’s screaming
Either because he’s angry or cause he’s sad
I think, I think Raven’s mad tonight

[Verse 1]
I’m so angry and I’ma let the world know it
If seein is believing then it’s time for me to show it (watch this)
I put the lightning in the night when I fly by
And make the Earth shake when I scream into the sky
Some look at me like I’m bringing bad intentions
Cause they see me cluckin on the souls of all the unforgiven
I got the visibility to see inside
All the deepest fears that people try to hide
I’m watching over, waiting for my next adventures
Lookin out for bodies waiting to surrender – the next contender
So when you see me coming better run for cover
Cause it’s time to make these motherfuckers suffer

[Chorus]
The dark sky looks evil
The dark sky looks evil
The dark sky looks evil
I think Raven is mad tonight [x2]

[Verse 2]
Dark visions in the night with no ???
Heart stoppin, jaw droppin cause I do it so proper
I’m from another dimension looking for someone to witness
We scream to a higher God just to release some tension
I got a lot of self-hate that I must rotate
Before I rip through the sky and start to aggravate
Turning all of my power into electrical showers
And burn the visions of a hot flame about to devour
I’m taking back my reputation as the owner in the sky
So when you see me fly by just look deep into my eyes
Bringing drama to this world cause it gets what it deserves
And if it wasn’t for the Raven then the Earth would never turn

[Hook]

[Verse 3]
What’s my reason?
It’s open season and I’m so mad
Will I continue
Finding evil in you built up from your past?
Hear my thunder
Feel my pain crumble under this earth
Bright blue lightning
Keeps darkness shining
So I can see you when I lurk (see you when I lurk)

[Hook x4]
